actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, in order to permit nationals of the United States to Serve as officers and crew aboard vessels documented under laws of the United States.

summary.text: Permits nationals of the United States to serve as officers and crew aboard vessels documented under laws of the United States under the Merchant Marine Act of 1936.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, in order to permit nationals of the United States to Serve as officers and crew aboard vessels documented under laws of the United States.
